meanings.definition: To treat or combine with an epoxide.
meanings.sent1: She epoxidizes the wood to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: The chemist epoxidizes the compound to create a new material.
meanings.sent3: The artist epoxidizes her paintings to give them a glossy finish.
meanings.sent4: His dedication epoxidizes his work ethic, making him stand out.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight epoxidizes the plastic, causing it to harden.

meanings.definition: To undergo a reaction to form an epoxide.
meanings.sent1: The chemical solution epoxidizes when exposed to heat.
meanings.sent2: The substance epoxidizes rapidly in the presence of oxygen.
meanings.sent3: The fruit epoxidizes as it ripens, releasing a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement epoxidizes when she sees her favorite band perform.
meanings.sent5: The metal epoxidizes under pressure, changing its structure.
